title: Mushroom and parsnip rösti pie
description: An unfussy, hearty, warming winter pie that would satisfy the richest and most lavish tastebuds, but light enough that it won’t send you to sleep.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10oz mixed mushrooms (preferably portobello, chestnut and wild mushrooms), roughly chopped into chunks
200ml/7fl oz white wine or vegetable stock
small bunch fresh flatleaf parsley, roughly chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
